description: Join the zany adventures of the genius scientist Rick and his lovable, albeit easily influenced grandson Morty in the 'Rick and Morty' franchise. Explore mind-bending dimensions and laugh out loud as they navigate through hilarious and thought-provoking situations across five seasons.

Welcome to the outrageous world of 'South Park'! In this franchise, follow the antics of four boys - Stan, Kyle, Cartman, and Kenny - as they tackle the quirks and absurdities of their small Colorado town. With 24 seasons, expect irreverent humor and sharp social commentary.

Step into the vibrant world of 'The Simpsons' franchise! Join the iconic Simpsons family - Homer, Marge, Bart, Lisa, and Maggie - as they navigate the humorous ups and downs of life in Springfield. With 32 seasons, relive classic moments and heartfelt hilarity.

mainCharacters: Stewie, Peter, Lois, Meg, Chris, Brian
description: Embark on a time-traveling adventure with the 'Family Guy' franchise! Join Stewie Griffin, the diabolical baby genius, and the rest of the Griffin family - Peter, Lois, Meg, Chris, and Brian the talking dog - in 21 seasons of hilarious misadventures and absurdity.
